tool_description: Calculates comprehensive revenue metrics including gross revenue, net revenue, margins, and profitability indicators for product performance analysis.

cost_data.description: Product cost data for margin calculations

error_messages: Data length mismatch: sales_data and cost_data arrays must have the same length.
Invalid tax rate: tax_rate must be between 0 and 1.
Invalid discount rates: All discount rates must be between 0 and 1.
Empty data arrays: Both sales_data and cost_data must contain at least one entry.
Invalid currency code: Currency must be a valid 3-letter ISO currency code.
usage: Provide sales_data and cost_data arrays of equal length, optionally specify discount_rates, tax_rate, and currency. Returns detailed revenue calculations and profitability metrics.

net_revenue.description: Net revenue after discounts and taxes
